email.name: NewReview
email.subject: Elioplus New Review Notification
email.body:
Hi,
A user from our platform, {CompanyName}, wrote a review about your partner program.
Visit your profile to view it.

email.name: NewInboxMessage
email.subject: Elioplus Inbox New Message Notification

email.name: EmailToFriends
email.subject: Elioplus New message Notification
email.body:
A company from our platform,{CompanyName}, sent you an email at {date}. Login to your dashboard to reply.
Subject: {EmailSubject}
Go to your Messages in your dashboard to see your new message and reply.
View it now here

email.name: ResentLeads
email.subject: You have a new partner lead on Elioplus
email.body:
Hi,
You have a new prospect lead on your dashboard.
To view it, go to our website, login and go to your profile.
Navigate to the Leads tab where you'll see the details and get in touch with the respective company directly
View it now here

email.name: NotFullRegisteredUser
email.subject: Now it is time to complete your profile
email.body:
Hi,
We noticed that you haven't completed your company’s profile yet.
Why now it’s the time to do it?
We are attracting more and more users every day on our platform. If you complete your company's public profile not only you'll create more awareness and exposure but we’ll also be able to connect you with business partners.
We are an all-in-one solution for vendors and resellers to engage in new business and also collaborate through our platform.
25.000+ opportunities are waiting for you. Login to complete your registration.

email.name: ActivationAccount
email.subject: Your account on Elioplus is active
email.body:
Hi,
Thanks for joining our platform!
We send you some quick notes to help you get started and make better use of our platform.
From your dashboard you'll be able to view statistics about your profile views, the incoming messages from other users and also your new leads and get in touch with them directly.
If haven’t done it already, add your data on our matching tool that is located on the "Find new Partners" tab of your dashboard in order to get matched accurately with your new partners!
We love feedback so if you have any suggestion or inquiry just reply to this message or use the contact form on our website.

email.name: NewFullRegisteredUser
email.subject: New Company Full Registration ({CompanyType})

email.name: NewSimpleRegisteredUser
email.subject: New Company Simple Registration
email.body:
A new company was registered at {date}

email.name: Resetpassword
email.subject: Reset your password
email.footer:
If you didn't request this, you can ignore this email or let us know.
Your password won't change until you create a new.

email.name: ContactElioplusMessage

Subject: {EmailSubject}.
Company Phone: {Phone}.
Email: {UserEmail}.
Message:
{Message}

email.name: ErrorNotificationEmail

email.name: CommunityUpvoteUserPost
email.subject: A member upvoted your post
email.body:
Hi,
One of our members, {Community name of the user}, found your post interesting and gave it a positive vote.
Log in to our community to see who.
View it now here

email.name: CommunityCommentUserPost
email.subject: Someone commented your post
email.body:
Hi,
A member on the Elioplus community ,{Community name of the user}, commented at your post.
Log in to read it and reply.
View the comment here

email.name: CommunityFollowUserPost
email.subject: A new member is following you now
email.body:
Hi,
A member from our community, {Community name of the user}, has liked your profile and is now following you.
Log in to see more details and follow back if you like.
Login to Elioplus community

email.name: CommunityCreateNewPost
email.subject: A member you follow shared a post
email.body:
Hi,
Our user, {Community name of the user}, whom you follow has added a new post.
Log in to our community to read it and leave your comment.
View the submitted post here

email.name: NewFullRegisteredCommunityUser

email.name: InboxEmail
email.subject: New Inbox Email
email.body: You received a new email: {CompanyEmail}

email.name: InvitationEmail
email.title: Let's work together
email.subject: You are invited to join the {CompanyName} team
email.footer:
What is Elioplus?
It's a platform that enables vendors to recruit and manage their channel partners seamlessly. Learn more

email.name: StripeTrialActivationEmail
email.subject: Your trial period on Elioplus has just started
email.body:
Hi,
Thanks for starting your 14-day trial on our platform. Below are some details so you can make better use of your trial:
Our system has started to process the data you provided in order to match you with potential channel partners. Periodically, every couple of days, new connections will be added to your "My connections" tab.
You can use these data to follow up with each channel partner based on your company's internal process or you can add them as opportunities in order to create a prospect pipeline with just one click.
Once the trial ends you will receive a complete report with all your connections and activity on our platform.

email.subject: Task Reminder Notification

What is Elioplus?

email.name: AcceptInvitationEmail
email.title: Congratulations!
email.subject: Collaboration Invitation Confirmed by {CompanyName}
email.body: {CompanyName} has accepted your invitation to join and collaborate with you!
email.footer:
What is Elioplus?
It's a platform that enables vendors and their partners to collaborate seamlessly. Learn more

email.name: CollaborationInvitationEmailForNotFullRegisteredUsers
email.title: Let's collaborate!
email.subject: You are invited to join the {CompanyName} collaboration team
email.body:
Hi,
A colleague from {CompanyName} invited you to join the collaboration team on Elioplus.
First, we noticed that you haven't completed your company’s profile.
Why now it’s the time to do it?
We are attracting more and more users every day on our platform. If you complete your company's public profile not only you'll create more awareness and exposure but we’ll also be able to connect you with business partners.
We are an all-in-one solution for vendors and resellers to engage in new business and also collaborate through our platform, like now.
25.000+ opportunities are waiting for you. Login to complete your registration first and accept the invitation you received from {CompanyName} right after.
You' ll be able to accept it, from your Collaboration-tool dashboard page.
Welcome to our crew!

email.name: NewSimpleRegisteredThirdPartyToElioUser
email.subject: New Company Simple Registration(Convert Third Party to Elio User)

email.name: ClaimProfileResetPasswordEmail
email.subject: Claim Profile and reset password
email.body:
You made a request for claiming this Elioplus profile at {date}.
Your account password is {newPassword}
You can log in with these credentials, your email and this password.
We recommend to change it when you log in for your safety.
email.footer:
If you didn't request this, you can ignore this email or let us know.
Your password won't change until you create a new.

email.name: ContactElioplusToApproveDemoRequestEmail
email.subject: Approve Demo Request
email.body:

You can approve it through Dashboard, Management, Demo Requests in order to receive it company {DemoCompany}.
Login to Elio dashboard to see it.
